title: CDC Panel Recommends Giving First Covid-19 Vaccines to Health Workers, Nursing Homes
sub_head: A decision could come Wednesday, as drug makers  await word in coming weeks of emergency-use authorization of two vaccines
body:
A federal vaccine advisory panel recommended that health-care workers and residents of long-term care facilities be the first to receive any Covid-19 vaccine doses from the limited supply that will be available initially.
The panel, which advises the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention, voted 13-1 on Tuesday in favor of giving the first vaccines to about 21 million health-care workers and three million residents of long-term care facilities.
